publication.authorlist: Hetet G, Devaux I, Soufir N, Grandchamp B, Beaumont C
publication.title: Molecular analyses of patients with hyperferritinemia and normal serum iron values reveal both L ferritin IRE and 3 new ferroportin (slc11A3) mutations

mutation.metadata: The ferritin gene FTL is located on the positive strand of chrosome 19 from 49,468,566-49,470,136 (GRCh37). The numbering used in the publication corresponds to the 5UTR sequence found in NM_000146.3. Therefore, the deletion refered to as delT42-G57 affects the genomic positions 49468597-49468622. If we display this in the context of the 5UTR sequence from positions 41-60, we see acag[TGTTTGGACGGAACAG/-]atc. Note that according to the VCF convention the leftmost possible positions are chosen. The mutation corresponds to NM_000146.3:c.-168_-143del26.
